description.zh: NodeBB 是一个基于 Node.js 构建的现代论坛软件，支持 Redis、MongoDB 或 PostgreSQL 作为后端数据库。它利用 WebSocket 实现实时互动和通知功能，将传统论坛结构与现代网页特性相结合。平台提供基础核心功能，并通过插件支持扩展更多功能。
description.en: NodeBB is a modern forum software built on Node.js, supporting Redis, MongoDB, or PostgreSQL as backend databases. It leverages web sockets for real-time interactions and notifications, combining traditional forum structures with contemporary web features. The platform offers a core set of functionalities, with extended capabilities available through plugins.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 在保留传统论坛结构的同时融合现代网页技术
- 模块化设计支持通过插件灵活扩展
- 主题高度可定制，具有高度设计自由度
- 基于 WebSocket 实现实时互动与通知
- 响应式设计适配桌面与移动设备

## 功能列表:

- 支持 Redis、MongoDB 和 PostgreSQL 数据库
- 提供丰富的 RESTful 读写 API
- 移动端自适应用户界面
- 内建极简“Harmony”主题，便于快速启动
- 支持 Redis 配置的集群部署
- 强大的主题系统，支持 SCSS/CSS 样式定制
- 通过 Transifex 支持多语言翻译
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Combines traditional forum structure with modern web technologies
- Modular design allows easy extension through plugins
- High flexibility in theming and customization
- Real-time interaction and notification support via web sockets
- Responsive design ensures compatibility across desktop and mobile devices

## Features:

- Support for Redis, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL databases
- RESTful read/write APIs
- Mobile-responsive user interface
- Minimalist "Harmony" theme for quick setup
- Cluster support with Redis configuration
- Rich theming system with SCSS/CSS styling
- Multilingual support via Transifex
